contentBody.headMarkup:
<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }"
/>

<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }"
/>
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }"
/>
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }"
/>

<!-- branding stylesheets -->

<!-- General -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="<SITE>/favicon.ico?v=2" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{basePath}/assets/css/theme.css?{versionKey}" />

<style>
    /* Contact US */
    .contact-bottom-wrapper {
    column-gap: 129px;
    
    grid-template-rows: auto;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr auto;
    grid-auto-columns: 1fr;
    margin-top: 2rem;
    padding-right: 2rem;
    display: grid;
}
    .field-label {
    letter-spacing: .4px;
}
.field-label {
    letter-spacing: .5px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    font-family: Rubik, sans-serif;
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    line-height: 1.4rem;
}

label {
    margin-bottom: .25rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}
label {
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    font-weight: 700;
    display: block;
}
    .form-input {
    background-color: var(--white);
    border: 1px solid #c8ccd8;
    border-radius: 5px;
    min-height: 3rem;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding: .5rem 1rem;
}
.w-input, .w-select {
    color: #333;
    vertical-align: middle;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    width: 100%;
    height: 38px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.42857;
    display: block;
}
input {
    line-height: normal;
}
button, input, optgroup, select, textarea {
    color: inherit;
    font: inherit;
    margin: 0;
}
    
    input.w-button {
    -webkit-appearance: button;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1440px)
.button {
    padding-left: 1rem;
    padding-right: 1rem;
}

.button {
    border: 1px solid var(--button-primary);
    background-color: #f77c00;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    letter-spacing: .2px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    min-width: 180px;
    margin-top: 0;
    padding: .75rem 1.2rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}
    .button:hover {
    border: 1px solid #f77c00;
    background-color: #fff;
    color: var(--button-primary);
}
    
    
   /* Landing page New Section */
    
    a#w-tabs-0-data-w-tab-1{
        background-color: #4a5e78 !important;
    }
    
    .tab-link.w--current {
    background-color: #4a5e78;
    color: #fff;
}
    
    .text-size-medium.margin-bottom.margin-small {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
}
.text-size-medium.margin-bottom.margin-small {
    margin-top: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    font-size: 1.6rem;
    line-height: 2rem;
}
.margin-bottom.margin-small {
    color: #F77C00;
    text-align: left;
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    padding-left: 0;
    font-size: 2.2rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 2rem;
}
    
    .tab-list {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-left: 2rem;
    font-family: Karla, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 400;
}
    
   .section-tabs {
    background-color: #fff;
    background-image: url(https://assets-global.website-files.com/62cc627…/62cc627…_benefits-right-overlay.png), url(https://assets-global.website-files.com/62cc627…/62cc627…_benefits-overlay.png);
    background-position: 100% 100%, 0 18%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat, no-repeat;
    background-size: auto, auto;
    padding-top: 2rem;
    padding-bottom: 2rem;
}
    
    #w-node-_5a162b66-62ed-1646-bf31-dd7ca21c8e79-39484ead {
    grid-area: span 1 / span 1 / span 1 / span 1;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1440px)
.tabs-content-left {
    font-size: 1.3rem;
}
.tabs-content-left {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    padding: 2rem 4rem;
    display: flex;
}
    
    main > section:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) {
    -webkit-font-smoothing: initial !important;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased !important;
}
    
    .tab-link {
    background-color: var(--white);
    color: var(--text-color-blue);
    letter-spacing: .2px;
    border: 1px solid #c8ccd8;
    border-radius: 90px;
    margin-left: .3125rem;
    margin-right: .3125rem;
    padding: .625rem 1.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
}
.w-tab-link {
    vertical-align: top;
    text-align: left;
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #222;
    background-color: #ddd;
    padding: 9px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
}
.w-inline-block {
    max-width: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
}
    .tabs-menu {
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 2.1875rem;
    margin-bottom: 3.125rem;
    display: flex;
}
.w-tab-menu {
    position: relative;
}
    
    .tabs-image {
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height: none;
}
.tabs-image {
    object-fit: fill;
    width: auto;
    max-width: 100%;
    height: 360px;
    padding-top: 0;
}
    .tabs-menu {
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 2.1875rem;
    margin-bottom: 3.125rem;
    display: flex;
}
    
    .tabs-content-wrapper {
    background-color: var(--white);
    border-radius: 5px;
    grid-template-rows: auto;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    grid-auto-columns: 1fr;
    display: grid;
    overflow: hidden;
}
    
    
    
    
    
    
    /*   Landing page */
    
    .revs-item w-inline-block{
         
    justify-content: space-between;
    }
    
    .revs-bottom-content {
  column-gap: 32px;
  grid-row: 32px;
  grid-template-columns: auto auto;
  grid-auto-columns: 1fr;
  margin-top: 4.6875rem;
  display: grid !important;
        grid-column: 32px;
        overflow: hidden;
}
  
  .revs-content-wrapper {
  width: auto;
  background-color: #f2f4f5;
  padding: 1.9rem 1.875rem;
       
}
  
  .revs-image-wrapper{
       transition: all 0.4s;

  object-fit: fill;
  position: static;
  }
  
  .revs-image-wrapper:hover  {
 transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) rotateX(0deg)
    rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg);
  transform-style: preserve-3d;

  z-index: -1;
}
  
  .page-padding {
  column-gap: 0px;
  color: var(--text-blue-primary);
  flex-direction: column;
  order: 0;
  align-self: stretch;
  margin-top: 0;
  padding: 0 4rem;
  display: flex;
} 
    /* News Section */
  .news-image {
    transition: all 0.4s;
    object-fit: fill;
    position: static;
  }

  .news-image:hover {
    transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) rotateX(0deg)
      rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg);
    transform-style: preserve-3d;
  }

  .news-image-wrapper1 {
    top: 30px;
    position: relative;
  }

  .news-card-item {
    background-color: #f2f4f5;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.18);
    border-radius: 4px;
    flex-direction: column;
    display: flex;
  }

  .news-card-component {
    column-gap: 30px;
    grid-template-rows: auto;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
    grid-auto-columns: 1fr;
    margin-top: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    display: grid;
    top: 10px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .newsparagraph {
    color: black;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
  }

  a,
  a:hover {
    text-decoration: none !important;
    color: black !important;
  }
  /*Header Section*/
  .lwc-4g1q55crn48-host .header.lwc-4g1q55crn48 {
    position: unset !important;
  }

  ..dxpStyle_669ad59d-7eed-4f41-89ba-53539f2f3803 {
    padding-left: unset;
  }

  .video-section1 {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    height: 35rem;

    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    display: flex;
    position: relative;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
  }

  .video-section1::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-image: linear-gradient(
      74deg,
      #011d43 10%,
      #011d43 31%,
      #011d43 54%,
      transparent
    );
    z-index: 1; /* Ensure it's above the video */
  }
  .video-section1 video {
    object-fit: cover; /* Ensure the video covers the div */
  }
  sup {
    font-size: 100% !important;

    vertical-align: baseline;
  }
  .subheading {
    font-size: 1.3rem;

  }

  .home-publication-wrapper {

  .download-image-wrapper {

  .download-image-wrapper:hover {

  .lwc-68jnud16dda,

  .video {

  .text {

    /* Product Detail Page Tabs */
    
    .rich-text-block-2 {
    padding-top: 10px;
    font-family: Karla, sans-serif;
    
}
    
     li {

    margin-bottom: .75rem;
    line-height: 1.6875rem;
}
    
    /* Product Catalog */
    
    .section-catalague {
    background-color: #fff;
    background-image: url(https://assets-global.website-files.com/62cc627…/62cc627…_benefits-right-overlay.png), url(https://assets-global.website-files.com/62cc627…/62cc627…_benefits-overlay.png);

}

    color: white;

}
    
    /* Case Studies */
    .case-study-cms-list {
    border-top: 1px solid #c8ccd8;

}

}

}

}

}

}

}

}
